name: watchdog
description: An Timer used to Detect and Recover from Malfunctions

scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run rollup && npm run dist:es6to5
scripts.doc:
npm run dist && echo '# Watchdog v'$(jq -r .version package.json)' Documentation
' > docs/index.md && jsdoc2md dist/watchdog.js >> docs/index.md
scripts.lint: echo tslint v`tslint --version` && tslint --project tsconfig.json --type-check "{src}/**/*.ts" --exclude "tests/fixtures/**" --exclude "dist/" && npm run clean && tsc --noEmit
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.test:npm: npm run dist && export TMPDIR=/tmp/watchdog-npm.$$ && mkdir $TMPDIR && npm pack && mv    watchdog-*.*.*.tgz $TMPDIR && cp tests/fixtures/smoke-testing.js $TMPDIR && cd $TMPDIR && npm init -y && npm install watchdog-*.*.*.tgz && node smoke-testing.js
